IP_SYN_4_var_6: Electromagnetic navigational bronchoscopy was performed for a right upper lobe nodule. General anesthesia was used. The airway was normal. Using the SuperDimension system, we navigated to the RUL anterior segment. Radial EBUS showed a concentric view. Needle biopsies showed lymphocytes. Forceps biopsies were also taken. No pneumothorax was seen on fluoroscopy.
